BLHar542.Note:
Stanzas 18 to end of the Harley 2251 version as noted by Macracken, written by the hand of John Stow on a single sheet of paper, written only on one side; this appears to come from the same source as the fragment of 5428 in London,  British Library Harley 374. Lydgate’s Order of Fools  22 8-line stanzas; but here, only 5 last stanzas in Stow's hand
                    In Stow’s hand, from same original manuscript as London,  British Library Harley 374.

Bod648.First Lines:
[T]he order of fooles fele yere a goo begunneNewly professyd
                    encresyd the couent…
Bod648.Last Lines:
…With hores hasardores to hold her resydensHonge þem vp
                    for þey shall neuer thee
